title: Creamy Chicken Scampi
description: Chicken takes the place of shrimp in this dish inspired by the Olive Garden classic -- making it even more weeknight friendly.
author: Food Network

steps.name: Start the pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
add pasta to the pot, cook for 10 minutes

steps.name: Sear the chicken
instructions: heat olive oil on high then add chicken a few pieces at a time to deeply brown
add and cook garlic until soft

steps.name: Bringing it all together!
instructions: Drain the pasta and add to the pan with the white wine sauce
